entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: topghostly/glyph-cms: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. 🚀
entry.content: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. 🚀

entry.title: IlanMoyal/moyal.js.test: A lightweight, dependency-free JavaScript testing utility. This project is framework-agnostic and usable in both browser and Node.js environments.
entry.content: A lightweight, dependency-free JavaScript testing utility. This project is framework-agnostic and usable in both browser and Node.js environments.

entry.title: xjsdev/iorpc: This is a lightweight module for implementing remote asynchronous function calls (RPC) between different scripts using various transports, like WebSockets. It allows calling functions on a remote API and routing responses with minimal configuration.
entry.content: This is a lightweight module for implementing remote asynchronous function calls (RPC) between different scripts using various transports, like WebSockets. It allows calling functions on a remote API and routing responses with minimal configuration.

entry.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
entry.content: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

entry.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
entry.content: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

entry.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
entry.content: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

entry.title: DebBidhi/text-enhancer: Text Enhancer is a lightweight browser extension that helps you improve your writing anywhere on the web. Whether you're writing social media posts, or commenting on articles, Text Enhancer acts like a "linter for text" - giving you instant AI-powered suggestions to enhance your writing with a simple keyboard shortcut.
entry.content: Text Enhancer is a lightweight browser extension that helps you improve your writing anywhere on the web. Whether you're writing social media posts, or commenting on articles, Text Enhancer acts like a "linter for text" - giving you instant AI-powered suggestions to enhance your writing with a simple keyboard shortcut.

entry.title: Teethedeveloper/HexSoftwares_Music_Player: MicDrop** is a modern, lightweight, and responsive music player built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a sleek design inspired by popular music apps, offering smooth animations, accessibility, and local storage support for a seamless user experience.
entry.content: MicDrop** is a modern, lightweight, and responsive music player built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a sleek design inspired by popular music apps, offering smooth animations, accessibility, and local storage support for a seamless user experience.

entry.title: AlexandrBaron/Library: Lightweight library project using 3-layer architecture (MVC) backed by PostgreSQL running in docker. Built with Express, Prisma ORM, and structured in a modular API design.
entry.content: Lightweight library project using 3-layer architecture (MVC) backed by PostgreSQL running in docker. Built with Express, Prisma ORM, and structured in a modular API design.
